name: isation
description:
Greetings, Coloniser! You're being briefed for project :isation.

We found a galaxy of cuboid planets, and we want to colonise them all.

I'll line up the colonists and move them slowly towards the planet.

What YOU need to do is this: rotate the planet using keys q, w, e, a, s and d and once you're happy with the alignment, SLAM the colonists into the planet by pressing the space bar. Act quickly, though, or I might do the SLAMMING for you.

PLANETS MUST BE PERFECTLY COVERED. We'll let you miss up to 42 regions. After that, Coloniser... you're on your own.
